fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Two times per game, may choose to put a bulletproof vest on during the night, preventing them from losing any lives that night.

fields.name: Atrributes:
fields.value:
- Has 2 lives.
- Upon being atttacked, will lose 1 life.
- Dies upon reaching 0 lives.

fields.name: Win Condition:
fields.value: - The :neutralFaction: Half Suicidal wins alone if they have one life at the end of the game.
